ipGenBE:
UI from Catalog: Generates only the HTML/JS screen files.
BE Class File: Generates only a Business Entity class file from some form of schema.
ipTemplateName: Standard template options. Select to view any configuration details.
ipMetadata: Existing configuration files for previously-generated BE or UI elements.
ipUserTemplateFile: Custom templates must be placed in the 'templates/custom' directory.
ipServiceURI: Use of this field allows you to alter the final location of your generated BE class. Leaving the field blank will default it to the original output directory.
ipEntityTable: Selecting multiple tables (or leaving blank) will result in multiple BE classes being created.
